section.title: What are Funding Contracts?
section.para: Funding Contract allow you to connect additional funding to an enrolment. Whether this be from a state funding source or private agreement, funding contact allows you to create a default payer and payment that will be used to fund all or part of an enrolment.

Funding course encompasses state funding sources link Smart and Skilled or CSO, but also provides for you to set up custom funding contract and link them to payers and enrolments. The funding contract can also be linked to the AVEMTISS Reporting type required for that contract.

onCourse has created default template for the State based funding contract, and integrated them with your reporting and online enrolment process using the Data Collection features. On higher level subscriptions, you are able to create custom funding contacts for any source of funding that supports the student enrolment, such as grants, department co-payment or even private contracts with large organisation.

section.title: Funding Contact List View
section.para: To view the funding contact list view, got to the top menu Training Funding Contact. Active Contracts are in black and inactive contracts are greyed out.

section.title: Activating a default funding contract
section.para: To activate a default funding contact, open the funding contact list view and then double click on the funding contact you wish to activate . Tick the box 'Active' to active the contact and then save.

section.title: Adding the default Funding Contact to a class
section.para: Once a Funding Contact is active, you can add it as a default funding type to the class. If you add the funding contact at the class all enrolment in the class will have the funding contract added when they enrol.
The Funding contact drop down on the class will only let you select active contracts.
If you duplicate the class the funding contract will not be duplicated, you will need to update it after the new class is created.

section.title: Custom Funding Contracts
section.para: If your subscription allows for you to make a custom funding contract, you can create them in the funding contact list view.

You many use this feature to create different contracts for specific program types or funding stream in a state funding or for additional funding sources outside the normal state contracts, such as grants or commercial agreements.
To create a new contract, Training Funding Contact to open the list view. Click on the "+" button to add a new contract.
You will need to name the funding contract appropriately. It's a good idea to include the type or funding or source.

If there is a reporting requirement you can select the AVETMISS Flavour appropriate to the funding time. If there is not specific flavour you should select NCVER (AVETMISS Standard) as the AVETMISS Flavour.
You will have the option to link the funding contract to a payer. If there no payer you can leave this blank.
Click save to complete the new contract.
